title: save rng states in cudnn.rnn
body_html:
In cudnn rnn backend, setDropoutDescriptor is called at every step:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/backends/cudnn/__init__.py#L220
which means that rng states will be re-initialized at every step from the same seed, and dropout will generate the same randoms at every step.
@adamlerer
